name: Mirror Bros
description:
YOU PLAY AS THE PLAYER AND YOU ALSO HAVE TO CONTROL HIS REFLECTION.
USE A & D OR ARROW KEYS TO MOVE. USE SPACEBAR TO JUMP. AVOID THE SPIKES WHICH COME IN YOUR WAY AND REACH TO THE END OF THE LEVEL ! MADE IN 2 DAYS  FOR THE BEN BONK GAMEJAM #3 NOTE - USE THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION FOR BEST EXPERIENCE. CREDITS - ALL THE PROGRAMMING, ART, VISUAL EFFECTS AND LEVEL DESIGNING IS DONE BY ME. SOUNDS CREDITS - Background Music By - Lemoncreme THANKS! NOTE - I UPDATED THE GAME NOW THE 'LEVEL 02 BUTTON HAS BEEN FIXED'.
